game_icon_prompt: A sleek and modern game icon featuring a stylized digital grid with smooth rotational arrow symbols and ripple effects that evoke kinetic movement. The design is vibrant, using a striking palette of saturated reds, bright blues, lush greens, radiant yellows, bold purples, and energetic oranges accented with neon glows. The icon features clean, semi-flat lines with subtle gradients and luminous outlines that emphasize precision and dynamic rotation. The composition is balanced and uncluttered, ensuring clarity even at 200x200 pixels, with a dark, abstract digital background that highlights the vibrant, flowing color patterns and kinetic energy of the puzzle gameplay.

message.content:
GAME-ICON-PROMPT-BEGIN
A sleek and modern game icon featuring a stylized digital grid with smooth rotational arrow symbols and ripple effects that evoke kinetic movement. The design is vibrant, using a striking palette of saturated reds, bright blues, lush greens, radiant yellows, bold purples, and energetic oranges accented with neon glows. The icon features clean, semi-flat lines with subtle gradients and luminous outlines that emphasize precision and dynamic rotation. The composition is balanced and uncluttered, ensuring clarity even at 200x200 pixels, with a dark, abstract digital background that highlights the vibrant, flowing color patterns and kinetic energy of the puzzle gameplay.
GAME-ICON-PROMPT-END
